column1: #Text=Another policy says , section 7 of the ' Charter of Rights ' should be amended to qualify the term " everyone " with the words , " including the pre-born child from the moment of conception " as having the right to life , liberty and security of the person .

column1: #Text=The criminal code must be amended to recognize the personhood of all human beings , from conception to natural death , ensuring their rights under the Constitution .
#Text=These are only a few out of a few hundred policies a government has to deal with .
#Text=But these are all Biblical principles which the CHP defends .
#Text=If there were no CHP Candidate , we could not vote our convictions , and for the Christian principles we hold dear .
#Text=In the Spectator of Sep . 16 we could read the often used quote , " Those who do not learn the lessons of history are doomed to repeat them .

column1: #Text=Previous to this campaign , have you been politically involved ?
#Text=How will you apply your previous work/volunteer/life experience to serving your constituents ?
#Text=Yes , I ran as a Candidate before , and we will have to face the same issues again , for nothing has changed for the better , but only got worse .
